original_text: And it was so, when they saw that there was much money in the chest, that the king's scribe and the high priest came up, and they put up in bags, and told the money that was found in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 이에 그 궤 가운데 은이 많은 것을 보면 왕의 서기와 대제사장이 올라와서 여호와의 성전에 있는 대로 그 은을 계산하여 봉하고

sentences.original_text: when they saw that there was much money in the chest
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 궤 안에 많은 돈이 있는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: that the king's scribe and the high priest came up
and they put up in bags
and told the money that was found in the house of the Lord
